sentences.en: Administrative personnel should also acquire some technical skills.
sentences.cn: 管理人员也应该学几门手艺.

sentences.en: After having been instructed to drive out of town, I began to acquire confidence.
sentences.cn: 接到把车开出城的指令后, 我的信心增长了.

sentences.en: Another third of the elementary schools are actively working to acquire computers.
sentences.cn: 另有三分之一的小学正在积极准备添置计算机.

sentences.en: He managed to acquire a thin veneer of knowledge to mask his real ignorance.
sentences.cn: 他设法装出有点知识的外表,用来掩饰自己的无知.

sentences.en: Here is your opportunity to acquire a luxurious one bedroom home.
sentences.cn: 现在正是购买一套豪华一居室住房的机会。

sentences.en: I tried to acquire the information I needed.
sentences.cn: 我千方百计地搞到了我所需要的资料.

sentences.en: If you want to acquire profound knowledge, you must start from the ABC.
sentences.cn: 要想造就高深的学问, 就得从基础学起.

sentences.en: It makes invaluable reading for anyone who wants to acquire a greater depth of understanding of the subject.
sentences.cn: 想要对这个问题有更加深入的了解，读读它会受益匪浅。

sentences.en: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.cn: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.en: Many children acquire a phobic horror of dogs.
One will never be able to understand why these political issues can acquire such force.
sentences.cn: 人们永远也不会明白为什么这些政治问题会有如此大的影响力。

sentences.en: Or consider how you can acquire these skills, e.g. by taking extra courses.
sentences.cn: 或者考虑你该如何获取这些技术，比如再修读几门课程。

sentences.en: Perhaps we did acquire a somewhat fuddy-duddy image in the later years.
sentences.cn: 可能在后来的几年里我们真的让人感到有些古板。

sentences.en: pumpkin pie is an acquired taste.
sentences.cn: 喜欢吃南瓜馅饼是后天养成的嗜好。

sentences.en: She has acquired a good knowledge of English.
She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.cn: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

sentences.en: She was keen to acquire more advanced culinary skills.
sentences.cn: 她热切渴望学到更高超的烹饪技巧。

sentences.en: They acquire authority from their predictive power.
sentences.cn: 它们的权威性来自其预测事物的能力。

sentences.en: To remove any ambiguity we have to acquire more accurate information.
sentences.cn: 为了消除含糊不清,我们必须取得更加精确的情报.

words.tran_cn: [医] 后天的；已获得的；已成习惯的

trans.tran_cn: 获得，得到，购得，养成（习惯）
trans.tran_en: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

trans.tran_cn: 购得， 占有； 取得， 获得； 学到； 养成
trans.tran_en: to obtain something by buying it or being given it
